parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the heater core can cause coolant to leak into the passenger compartment, creating a hazardous environment for occupants. It can also lead to a loss of heat, making the vehicle uncomfortable to drive.
symptoms: Windshield fogs up while driving
coolant escapes from the heater coil
fumes come from the vents
smoke fills the vehicle
loss of heat.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the windshield wiper motor can reduce visibility during rainy or snowy conditions, increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: Windshield wipers do not work
windshield wipers fail during cold weather
windshield wiper motor burns out.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the heater blower motor can cause the heater to turn off automatically, making the vehicle uncomfortable to drive.
symptoms: Heater turns off automatically
heater blower motor replaced.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ABS control unit can cause the anti-lock braking system to malfunction, leading to reduced braking performance, increased stopping distances, and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: The ABS brake light stays on
the vehicle experiences a low brake pedal
the ABS system fails
and the brake calipers and rotors wear out too quickly.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Worn-out brake rotors and calipers can cause reduced braking performance, increased stopping distances, and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: The brake calipers and rotors get too thin too quickly
the vehicle experiences a low brake pedal
and the brake lights in the instrument panel stay on constantly.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Malfunctioning seat belts can increase the risk of injury or death in the event of an accident.
symptoms: The seat belts get stuck in the middle of retracting
and the passenger's seat belts get stuck.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the air conditioning condenser can cause the air conditioning system to malfunction, leading to reduced cooling performance, increased engine load, and potential overheating.
symptoms: The air conditioning system does not cool properly
the air conditioning system turns off automatically
the air conditioning condenser is faulty
the air conditioning system is not functioning.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The unavailability of air conditioning parts can cause delays in repairs, leaving the vehicle without a functioning air conditioning system, which can lead to discomfort and reduced safety during hot weather.
symptoms: The air conditioning part is not available
the repair is delayed
the air conditioning system is not functioning.
